snippet.title: Company of Heroes - Blitzkrieg Mod on STEAM - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
★ This short video tribute is especially made by me as an official trailer for the Bk mod Steam Green-light process. But of course this video doesn't show everything in the game, as there is definitely a lot more beauty things that new players need to discover in this mod!

► Visit the following link for more info regarding the Bk Mod Steam Greenlight:- 
http://forum.bkmod.net/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1824

- Also special thx to Leonida525 who helped me re-creating the scenes, his channel:- 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzipoMb3VXzu-5B9FqSnbDg

- Current soundtrack:- (copyright free)
Houston Vibes Score - Unicorn Heads
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=voJuFzkoKlM

- Previously used soundtrack:- (copyrighted, by Clint Mansell)
Fountain soundtrack - Death is the road to awe
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7FDAkpQSJVA
==================================
D-Day and Afrika historical add-on link:-
http://www.moddb.com/mods/historical-add-on-for-bk-mod
